pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, October 20, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, October 20, 2016:

Brampton, Ontario

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the new Amazon Fulfillment Centre and will make an announcement. A media availability will follow.

Amazon Fulfillment Centre           
8050 Heritage Road,
Brampton, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity for visit of centre. Open coverage for announcement and media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.
  • Media should enter through door E04 on north side of building.
  • Accredited media should RSVP to Michael Field, Paradigm Public Relations. mfield@paradigmpr.ca
  • Attire: Media must wear closed toed shoes, no heels. Hair should be tied up above the shoulders


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
